type.name: symbolized_class_select
type.description: A symbolized_class is a thing that has its members or subclasses symbolized by a schematic element.

type.name: symbolized_item_select
type.description: A symbolized_item is a thing that is symbolized by a schematic element.

entity.name: symbolization_by_schematic_element
entity.description: A symbolization_by_schematic_element is a presented_item_representation and a class that is a Symbolization_by_Schematic_element.

explicit.name: presentation
explicit.description: a the Schematic_element that stands for the symbolized.

explicit.name: item
explicit.description: a the thing that the symbolizer stands for.

entity.name: symbolization_of_member_or_subclass_by_schematic_element
entity.description: A symbolization_of_member_or_subclass_by_schematic_element is a presented_item_representation and a class that is a Symbolization_of_member_or_subclass_by_Schematic_element.

explicit.name: presentation
explicit.description: a the Schematic_element_definition that stands for the symbolized.

explicit.name: item
explicit.description: a the Class that the symbolizer stands for.

entity.name: symbolized_class
entity.description: A symbolized_class is a presented_item that is referenced by a Symbolization_of_member_or_subclass_by_Schematic_element.

explicit.name: item
explicit.description: a the class that is symbolized.

entity.name: symbolized_item
entity.description: A symbolized_item is a presented_item that is referenced by a Symbolization_by_Schematic_element.

explicit.name: item
explicit.description: a the thing that is symbolized.
